TopicTitle: Change Craft Description, Craft Disappears in the Tracking Station

Articles.Content:
I changed the description of my craft orbiting Kerbin in the Tracking Station and my craft disappeared. When viewing in the tracking station not all craft are shown, only the craft type is shown that is selected. In previous versions I don't think this was happening, so just as a heads up if your craft seems to disappear in the Tracking Station check the craft type that you have selected.

Edited August 6, 2016 by Castille7
Changed title because of a mistaken bug in the system

When viewing in the tracking station not all craft are shown, only the craft type is shown that is selected. In previous versions I don't think this was happening, so just as a heads up if your craft seems to disappear in the Tracking Station check the craft type that you have selected.

Not sure if this was already posted, if so please feel free to delete if it's not necessary.
Hi @Castille7, yes only craft who's filter is active will be shown, mouse over the top edge of the screen in the map or the tracking station to see the craft type filters drop down into view.
